text: bharyayavanva athæra dama maranayata pat vana obagen vu aya, tamange bharyayavanva (nivasin) pitamam kara nodama ek vasarak dakva posanaya karana men (urumakkarayinta) antima kæmætta danva sitinu. namut ovun (vasarak tula taman visinma) pitatata gos tamanta niyamita andamin (vivahaya adi) yam kisivak kara gænimehi oba kerehi varadak næta. allah balavantayeku ha tiyunu buddhiyen yuktavada sitinneya
